|postal_code_type = |postal_code = |blank_name = '''[[Human Development Index|HDI]]''' (2000) |blank_info = 0.825 |website = [http://www.indaial.sc.gov.br www.indaial.sc.gov.br] }} '''Indaial''' is a city in [[Santa Catarina (state)|Santa Catarina State]], [[Brazil]]. It is located on the left bank of [[Itajai River]]. The city is of European origin, with many textiles industries and strong agricultural activity. It has a small hotel network and some bank agencies. {{Santa_Catarina_MesoRegion_Vale_do_Itajai}} [[Category:Populated places in Santa Catarina (state)]] {{SantaCatarina-geo-stub}}
